snippet.title: Saborus - Official Trailer | OTK Games Expo 2024
snippet.description:
Explore the world of Saborus and see gameplay in this unsettling trailer for this upcoming horror and suspense game where you take on the role of a chicken inside a slaughterhouse owned by a large food industry company. With no special powers, no weapons and totally vulnerable, the player must escape from a dark and frightening place where everything has been specifically designed to kill. Saborus will be available on PC.

Guide the chicken by solving puzzles and using a few objects, one at a time, with its beak, to escape certain death while being chased by slaughterhouse workers and also by other scarier things that are the result of genetic manipulation and experiments by the food company.

#Gaming #Games #GameTrailers
